name: Dinner Tonight: Curried Egg Salad
description: [Photographs: Nick Kindelsperger] Egg salad is usually a monochromatic affair thanks to the healthy helping (or, as some people may point out, unhealthy helping) of mayo. Now, I happen to have a soft spot for this style, especially when it's...
recipeIngredient: 6 hard-boiled eggs, shells removed and chopped
1 cup diced Granny Smith apple (about 1 apple)

recipeInstructions.text: Pour 3 quarts of water into a medium-sized pot. Bring the water to a boil, and then reduce heat to a barely simmering. Carefully add the 6 eggs to the pot. Cook for 6 minutes. Remove the eggs and then dump into an ice bath until cool enough to handle. Remove the shells and chop the eggs.
Add the mayonnaise, lime juice, curry powder, Dijon, salt and cayenne in a bowl. Whisk until combined.
Fold in the eggs, apple, onion, and cilantro.
Construct the sandwiches. Scoop a bit of the egg salad onto a slice of bread and top with another slice. Serve.
